original_title: 日本女侠伝 激斗ひめゆり岬
overview: A boss from a trucking company has run-ins with evil yakuza during the American occupation of Okinawa. Her hometown is threatened by usurers, gangsters and indirectly by American GI influences. She must battle a yakuza organization with her employees to help settle things.
title: Trials of an Okinawa Village
